description:
As the world reacts to Doflamingo`s shocking announcement, Law and the Straw Hats plot the next move in their daring alliance, and a face from the past returns!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Secousses dans le nouveau monde. Une nouvelle incroyable !
Startling! The Big News Shakes Up the New World!
مروعة! تهز الأخبار المهمّة العالم الجديد!
激震! 新世界動かす大ニュース
